name: Mountain of Might
description:
Deep in the mountains, one peak stands tall among others. Atop it, epic duels take part.

This is a Ludum Dare 49 entry.

Quick post-mortem / Excuses, excuses

2/3rds of the development time were spent fiddling with and patching my incomplete physics engine to even allow for a tilting platform with remotely reasonable friction.

Originally I had a completely different idea, one that was definitely more original. However, as seems to be tradition by this point, I underestimated the extent to which I'd overscoped and had to restart. Fortunately I caught it early this time, only about 6 hours in.
